channel.title: Example media RSS playlist for the JW Player

item.title: Opening credits
item.description: In which we meet Proog and Emo, the two characters of this movie.

item.title: Wire attack
item.description: In which the computer world of our actors is being introduced.

item.title: The bird cave
item.description: In which Proog takes upon his role as a guide and savely sees Emo across.

item.title: Answer the phone
item.description: In which Proog takes upon his role as a guide and savely sees Emo across.

item.title: Across the gap
item.description: In which we learn that not everything here is what it looks like.

item.title: Elevator Ride
item.description: In which Proog and Emo jump into space, and fall back again.

item.title: Final Conflict
item.description: In which Emo does not tolerate Proogs guidance anymore, with fatal consequence.

item.title: Ending Credits
item.description: In which the huge list of contributers to this project passes by.
